import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get rules linked to a survey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/{SurveyId}/rules"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the list of business rules that assign this survey to tickets.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SurveyId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) to find the survey. Extract `Item[].SurveyId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. List surveys: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) -&gt; extract `SurveyId`
2. Get linked rules: GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/rules
3. Review which rules trigger this survey assignment

**Use Cases**:
- Audit which workflows trigger survey assignments
- Verify survey is properly linked before activation
- Troubleshoot why surveys aren't being assigned

**Notes**: Rules use the 'Assign Satisfaction Survey' action type to link surveys to ticket resolution events.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"SurveyId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the survey."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of rules linked to the survey.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"List of rules linked to a survey.","properties":{"Item":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","description":"A business rule that assigns this survey to tickets.
